entry.title: Alert System
entry.summary: In a conversation on September 8, 2011, John Smith warned to be cautious about relaying everything as it could potentially lead to Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks. The context of the conversation is not provided, but Smith's warning suggests that some actions could cause DDoS vulnerabilities. The recipient of Smith's message responded by suggesting the implementation of proof-of-work measures to prevent such attacks.
